main event: A civilian reported seeing an unidentified bright light for 15 minutes on September 6, 1968, in Blanchester, Ohio.
interesting points: The observer described the light as neat and bright, comparable to car headlights., The object moved straight toward the observer's vehicle for 4-5 miles before zooming straight up and disappearing., The sighting occurred at the corporation limits of Blanchester on Middleboro Road., The observer had not filled out the required Form 117, which was requested by the Air Force., The observation lasted for about 15 minutes.
